DOC.brief_summary: Background : Activation NO-synthase vascular potassium ( K ) channel may play role sepsis-induced attenuated sensitivity norepinephrine . We examine whether various K channel blocker NO-synthase inhibition could restore norepinephrine sensitivity experimental human endotoxemia .
DOC.brief_title: Blockade Vascular Potassium Channels During Human Endotoxemia
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer drug , alcohol , nicotine abuse
